divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling west on I-16 in the summer of 08, about noon, when I noticed a metal like egg-crab shaped craft floating over a building in downtown macon georgia. The vehicle was not a heliocopter or balloon. It had no wings or external propulsion. I have seen a simalar vehicle on a ufo program on TV. When I say crablike, I mean it seemed to have legs extending around the body of the vehicle. I only saw the object for a short time,15 seconds or so. Trying to watch traffic ,as not to wreck, I took my I off the craft for a couple of seconds. When I looked back the craft had totaly disapeared? I first noticed the craft when I noticed a man shading his eyes to look at some thing over this building. When I looked toward where he was staring I noticed the craft. I can only speculate that this craft was some sort of advanced survalance vehicle from robins air force base. Or it possible be some ET?
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Macon
There were no other sightings in Macon on or around July 15th 2008
Summary: Metallic crab like vehicle hovering over building in Macon, Georgia.
